text: Kim Han-gil (; born 21 June 1995) is a South Korean footballer who plays as a Midfielder for FC Seoul. == Club career == === FC Seoul === Kim Han-gil made his debut in the K League 1, against Suwon Samsung Bluewings on March 5, 2017.슈퍼매치 23세이하 출전 규정이 변수…서울 김한길-수원 고승범 선발출전 == References == == External links == * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:South Korean footballers Category:FC Seoul players Category:K League 1 players Category:South Korea under-20 international footballers Category:South Korea under-23 international footballers
title: Kim Han-gil (footballer)
